title: 7 For All Mankind Women's Dark Wash Mid Rise Dojo Jeans
description: This dojo jeans in dark wash bairfate provides a feminine and sophisticated look flare leg
Easy to put on and take off with zip-fly and button closure
Mid-rise waistline for a comfortable and versatile fit
Mid weight fabric is suitable for various occasions and seasons

7 for All Mankind refers to the belief that every person should own at least seven pair of jeans, one for every day of the week. Through higher quality materials and tailoring, 7 for All Mankind revolutionized denim to bring a premium product to everyone. Jeans that is sure to be the perfect fit. A great everyday jeans in a universal fit that is sure to sit right on the waist, through the thigh and down through the leg.
